meanings.sent1: She walked quietly, accompanying her friend to the store.
meanings.sent2: The music played softly, accompanying the sound of rain outside.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat on the windowsill, accompanying the falling leaves with its gaze.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone brightly, accompanying the moon in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh bread filled the kitchen, accompanying the laughter of children.

meanings.definition: Going along with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The accompanying dog wagged its tail happily as they walked.
meanings.sent2: She carried the accompanying bag filled with books on her shoulder.
meanings.sent3: The accompanying birds chirped merrily as they flew overhead.
meanings.sent4: The accompanying clouds followed the airplane across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The accompanying music added joy to the dance performance.

meanings.sent1: He brought an accompanying umbrella in case it rained.
meanings.sent2: The accompanying notes in the book provided further explanation.
meanings.sent3: The accompanying sauce enhanced the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent4: The accompanying illustrations in the presentation made it more engaging.
meanings.sent5: The accompanying smile on her face showed her genuine happiness.
